Description.val: This program funds the procurement of common Armament Support Equipment (ASE), and Weapons Support Equipment (WSE) under the procurement and inventory control of the Naval Inventory Control Point and the Naval Air Systems Command.  This budget line supports:  (a) initial outfitting for all in-production weapons systems; (b) procurement of new Support Equipment, and (c) procurement of replacement items for obsolete Support Equipment.  These items support sustained operations and surge deployments of the CV battle groups.  Shipboard/Shorebased WSE is utilized by weapons departments to handle, transport, and maintain weapons.  Shipboard/Shorebased ASE is utilized by squadrons and supporting activities to load and service aircraft weapons and guns.

Justification.val: FY15 program transitions to the new BLI 4213 - Aircraft Support Equipment.

Name.@footnote: (SH042) MC WEAPONS ASSEMBLY STATION (A/E32K-11 LIFTING ASSLY) Reduction in quantity in FY14 due to realignment of funds to cost code SH036 to support the urgent requirement.

FiscalYear.@footnote: Contract change due to NDI production run quote was received and exceeded original contract cost for production.  After the completion of an independent government estimate it was determined the best strategy was to have a new contractor build to print using the NAVAIR owned drawing package.

Name.@footnote: (SH036) A/M32K-10 Munitions Trailers quantity increased FY14 due to being urgently needed to replace legacy A/M32K-4A Trailers which are not compatible with the prime mover vehicle and prone to overturning.
